DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare duration subject report comfortable contact lens daily wear time subject history current complaint CLDE 29-day treatment period azithromycin ophthalmic solution , 1 % , compare rewetting drop
DOC.brief_title: A Four Week Study Azithromycin Ophthalmic Solution , 1 % Versus Rewetting Drops Subjects With History Current Complaint Contact Lens-Related Dry Eye ( CLDE )
DOC.criteria: Have history current complaint CLDE . Use properly fit dailywear soft contact lens . Able wear contact lenses least 8 hour day . If female , nonpregnant nonlactating . Have change brand contact lens care solution within one month prior Visit 1 . Use extend ( overnight ) wear contact lens . Have clinically significant ophthalmic abnormality . Have cauterization punctum punctal plug ( silicone collagen ) insert remove within 90 day prior screen . Have active ongoing ocular infection ocular disease . Have serious medical condition could confound study assessment .
